feed.title: Yopolazi
feed.subtitle: 1st artisan Northern Chinese chili oil in US market. Handcrafted using a 400 year-old process. 100% natural ingredients. Zero Chemicals.

entry.title: Xiao Mian (Simple noodles) with Yopolazi
entry.content:
Xiao Mian 6 mins, serving 4

Ingredients:

Angel hair pasta: 1lb Yopolazi: 1tbsp Soy Sauce: 2 tbsp Vinegar: 1tbsp Salt: 1tsp

Process:

Boil water in a pot Put pasta in and keep boiling for 5 mins Drain pasta and add your choice of steamed vegetables Add Yopolazi, soy sauce, vinegar and salt, stir mix
